title: TASK_COWER
content:
0x3EB1FE9E8E908E150x9CF1C19B// TaskCower
void TASK_COWER(Ped ped, int duration);Parameters:ped: Ped id.duration: Duration of the animation in ms. Set to -1 if you do not want a duration.The ped will act like NPC's involved in a gunfight. The ped will squat down with their heads held in place and look around.
codeBlocks:
// TaskCower
void TASK_COWER(Ped ped, int duration);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for TASK_COWER
TaskCower(ped, 0)
